title: Under Trump, consumer watchdog drops case against online lender
summary: The CFPB withdrew its lawsuit against online lender Solo Funds, which it accused of misleading borrowers about loan costs
description: The CFPB withdrew its lawsuit against online lender Solo Funds, which it accused of misleading borrowers about loan costs
